import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { RiWalkFill } from "react-icons/ri"; import { IoMdRemoveCircleOutline } from "react-icons/io"; import { Container, Row, Col, Spinner } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector, useDispatch, } from 'react-redux' const Following = () => { const myAddedFollowers = useSelector(state => state.users.following) console.log(myAddedFollowers) const loading = useSelector(state => state.posts.loading) return (
Following
{ loading ? () : myAddedFollowers?.slice(0, 5).map(user => (
{user.firstName}
unfollow
)) }
) } export default Following
